Text.Page:
I'm Paesyn, of the Valkyon Federation's Special Forces.

I want to save Zolyn and myself,

so I've done a lot of research."On what?"

On moving to different worlds.

I've been so busy studying that I didn't have time to develop good fighting skills, though.

Also, my research is not complete. I can only stay in another world for a very short amount of time."I see."

That's why I need your help.

You'll help me, won't you?"Sure."

Really? Thanks!

Alright, I'm going to send you to another dimension.

Please take care of things that happen in there.

I'll be there for the main event.
Youâ€™ve saved Paesyn and Zolyn in another world.
Thank you. I couldn't have saved Paesyn and Zolyn if it weren't for you!

Because of you, Zolyn and I came back to life.

I'm happy just to look at Zolyn like this.

Thank you so much.
